ComicInfo.Summary:
52 writer Mark Waid makes his Cthulhu Tales debut with a macabre story that gives retailers and fans a glimpse of the future of BOOM!’s entire horror line! Plus: writer Mark Sable (GROUNDED, FEARLESS) creeps in with his take on the Lovecraft mythos, and the terrors he’s seen will take your breath away!
Story TitlesIn The Pi Of The Beholder by Mark WaidThere Will Be Blood by Mark Sable
